div.class: relative mx-auto w-full max-w-md grid grid-cols-3 md:flex items-center justify-center gap-y-8 md:gap-2 px-4
relative mx-auto md:w-[150px] bg-transparent group z-0

a.class: flex w-full flex-col items-center text-center group

div.class: relative w-[30px] !min-w-[30px] md:!min-w-[50px] aspect-square will-change-transform bg-background rounded-xl border p-3 text-foreground-lighter group-hover:text-foreground

text-foreground flex justify-center relative opacity-70 md:absolute md:bottom-0 md:opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity md:translate-y-8 md:-left-20 md:md:-right-20 font-mono uppercase text-center text-xs mt-2
